profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.
products:
✓ Spray Foam (1/2 lb open cell)
✓ HFO Spray Foam (2 lb closed cell), 
✓ Cellulose (Blown and dense-pack)
✓ Fibreglass (Batts, blown and blanket wrap)
✓ Mineral Wool (Batts)
✓ Hemp (Batts)
services:

brands: We offer high performance, brand name insulation backed by third party warranties. Our certified installers are professionally trained to install all types of insulation.

Removing your old insulation is just as important as installing new insulation. 

Removing your old insulation improves Air Quality in your home, prevents mould & mildew buildup and improves the heating/cooling efficiency of your home.

profile:
Excellent customer service, superior products and competitive pricing: Eco insulation has it all. 

Eco insulation are experts in the field of insulation for your home: from basements and crawl spaces to walls and attics, in either new construction or existing structures. All of our products contained recycled material and are recognized by the Canadian Construction Material Center. At Eco insulation we want out customers to feel comfortable with their decisions and the products we use. That’s why our staff will be pleased to take the time to provide you all the necessary information for you to make an informed decision when choosing the best solution for your home. So whether you’re tired of cold floors in the winter or wasting money on high energy bills, give us a call to explore your options during a free in-home evaluation. We offer two types of spray foam insulation – half pound density and two pound density closed and open celled foams – as well as cellulose loose fibre blown-in insulation with the versatility to insulate, soundproof and waterproof your home. We can also provide removal of existing insulation with mold or water damage. Best of all, ecoEnergy grants available to homeowners significantly offset the cost of our services making it the perfect time to improve your home’s comfort level and energy efficiency. Our knowledgeable sales staff can assist you in understanding how to make use of these programs as well as discuss your insulation needs. 

At Eco insulation, one call foams it all!
